# Go

## Reference: Golang History

[Golang](https://go.dev/doc/ "#goto-go") was designed by Robert Greisemer, Rob Pike, and Ken Thompson at Google in 2007.


## Flashcard: Golang Logo

What represent the Golang logo?

---

A gopher
